title: The Cheating Wives Club: Women are dying to join
description: The latest release by D. J. Jouett, is a romantic thriller that will keep the reader on the edge of their seat or their Kindle! When women in her home-town become the victims of a vicious killer, Psychiatrist Lana Reed is pulled into a world of serial killers and cheating wives. When she begins to suspect one of her patients, Dr. Reed finds herself struggling with doctor-patient confidentiality. As women continue to die, Lana must decide between her professional reputation and helping the man she loves solve the heinous crimes.  Sexy romance. Suspense thriller.
author: D.J. Jouett
